meanings.definition: A person who hunts with a bow.
meanings.sent1: The bowhunters quietly stalked their prey through the forest.
meanings.sent2: Many bowhunters prefer the challenge of hunting with a bow rather than a gun.
meanings.sent3: The bowhunters joked that they were like modern-day Robin Hoods.
meanings.sent4: In the world of hunting, bowhunters are the silent artists of the woods.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bowhunters drawing back their bows is both graceful and powerful.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the activity of bowhunting.
meanings.sent1: A group of bowhunters set out early in the morning to track deer.
meanings.sent2: The bowhunters shared stories of their most memorable hunting trips around the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The bowhunters were excited to test their skills in the upcoming archery competition.
meanings.sent4: To the bowhunters, the forest was their playground and hunting ground combined.
meanings.sent5: The camaraderie among bowhunters is as strong as their passion for the sport.
